channel.title: Please help if you know what a vps is
channel.description: ok so im thinking of buying a vps but im on windows 7 operating system, i just need it for my runescape private server, can someone explain to me why i need to provide my operating system

item.title: Please help if you know what a vps is
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I’m guessing you need to provide a product key for it.

The reason why there saying this is because windows server keys are very expensive(not if they buy it of me;3) an excess of $1k usd usually so its cheaper for them if you use a key. Usually people will use there own keys from a normal home edition of windows as a one of so everyone wins in this scenario.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help if you know what a vps is

item.title: Please help if you know what a vps is
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:2, topic:436888”]If you Have good internet and can hold your Pc on for 24/7 then you should Host with your Pc.
If your internet/computer is crap or ur internet fails u should get a vps.

VPS: Virtuel Private server, It’s like ur buying an other Computer for 1/12 months and u can run ur server in there.
U can connect from ur Pc to the online pc (vps) to manage ur Vps[/quote]
Virtual*

Read full topic
item.source: Please help if you know what a vps is

item.title: Please help if you know what a vps is
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

If you Have good internet and can hold your Pc on for 24/7 then you should Host with your Pc.
If your internet/computer is crap or ur internet fails u should get a vps.

VPS: Virtuel Private server, It’s like ur buying an other Computer for 1/12 months and u can run ur server in there.
U can connect from ur Pc to the online pc (vps) to manage ur Vps
